actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide a penalty of not less than 10 years imprisonment without release for damage by arson to houses of worship.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to revise the penalty for intentionally damaging religious real property or obstructing any person's enjoyment of the free exercise of religious beliefs where such an act results in bodily injury or includes the use of a dangerous weapon, explosives, or fire to not less than (currently, not more than) ten years' imprisonment.

titles.title: A bill to provide a penalty of not less than 10 years imprisonment without release for damage by arson to houses of worship.
